ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Its a safe trip and should take you 15 minutes (Real time w/ zoning) if you stay on the trail
ygData.messageBody:
Its a safe trip and should take you 15 minutes (Real time w/ zoning) if you
stay on the trail


> >
>
> I guess same question goes to Ak'anon. How safe is traveling to Ak'anon
> from Kaladim? Game time?
> Thanks.
>
> Maestra
>
> > Ak'anon has quite a selection of spells. Class specific spells can be
> > found in the outside edge rooms, and common spells are sold by the
> > merchants in the center. Warning: Elves are sometimes killed by a
> merchant
> > when they zone into the city.
> >
> > Malkin of Fennin Ro

> >
